name: API Epic
description:
As an application developer,
I want to manage pivotal Epics through REST API,
So that my app can get answers and show them.

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<project.id>/epics" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key | value        |
| id  | <project.id> |

the following body parameters:
| key  | value         |
| name | AUTO_NEW_EPIC |
the "POST" request to "/projects/<project.id>/epics" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value         |
| id   | <epic.id>     |
| name | AUTO_NEW_EPIC |
the "GET" request to "/projects/<project.id>/epics/<epic.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key        | value        |
| id         | <epic.id>    |
| project_id | <project.id> |

the following body parameters:
| key  | value            |
| name | AUTO_UPDATE_EPIC |
the "PUT" request to "/projects/<project.id>/epics/<epic.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value            |
| id   | <epic.id>        |
| name | AUTO_UPDATE_EPIC |
the "DELETE" request to "/projects/<project.id>/epics/<epic.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 204

name: API Label
description:
As an application developer,
I want to query the Label of the Pivotal API,
So that my app can consume those responses.

steps.name:
the following body parameters:
| key  | value           |
| name | AUTO_TEST_LABEL |
the "POST" request to "/projects/<project.id>/labels" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value           |
| id   | <label.id>      |
| name | AUTO_TEST_LABEL |
the "GET" request to "/projects/<project.id>/labels/<label.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key        | value        |
| id         | <Label.id>   |
| project_id | <Project.id> |

the following body parameters:
| key  | value             |
| name | AUTO_UPDATE_LABEL |
the "PUT" request to "/projects/<project.id>/labels/<label.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value                 |
| id   | <Project.id>          |
| name | NEW_AUTO_UPDATE_LABEL |
the "DELETE" request to "/projects/<project.id>/labels/<label.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 204

name: API Project
description:
As an application developer,
I want to manage pivotal Projects through REST API,
So that my app can get answers and show them.

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<Project.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key | value        |
| id  | <Project.id> |

the following body parameters:
| key  | value               |
| name | AUTO_UPDATE_PROJECT |
the "PUT" request to "/projects/<Project.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value               |
| id   | <Project.id>        |
| name | AUTO_UPDATE_PROJECT |
the "DELETE" request to "/projects/<Project.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 204

the following body parameters:
| key  | value            |
| name | AUTO_NEW_PROJECT |
the "POST" request to "/projects" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value          |
| name | <Project.name> |
| id   | <Project.id>   |

elements.name: Error when create a project with initial velocity up to 999

steps.name:
the following body parameters:
| key              | value            |
| name             | AUTO_NEW_PROJECT |
| initial_velocity | 9999             |
the "POST" request to "/projects" is sent
the response status code should be 400

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value          |
| code | <project.code> |
| kind | <project.kind> |

name: API Story
description:
As an application developer,
I want to manage pivotal Story through REST API,
So that my app can get answers and show them.

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/projects/<Project.id>/stories/<Story.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key        | value        |
| id         | <story.id>   |
| project_id | <project.id> |

the following body parameters:
| key  | value            |
| name | AUTO_NEW_PROJECT |
the "PUT" request to "/projects/<project.id>/stories/<story.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value               |
| id   | <Story.id>          |
| name | AUTO_UPDATE_PROJECT |
the "DELETE" request to "/projects/<Project.id>/stories/<story.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 204

the following body parameters:
| key  | value          |
| name | AUTO_NEW_STORY |
the "POST" request to "/projects/<Project.id>/stories" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value          |
| id   | <storie.id>    |
| name | AUTO_NEW_STORY |

elements.name: Story is not created when characters in the name are more than 5000

steps.name:
the following body parameters:
| key  | value                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| name |  |
the "POST" request to "/projects/<Project.id>/stories" is sent
the response status code should be 400

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value               |
| code | "invalid-parameter" |

elements.name: Story is not updated when characters in the name are more than 5000

steps.name:
the following body parameters:
| key  | value                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| name |  |
the "PUT" request to "/projects/<project.id>/stories/<story.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 400

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value               |
| code | "invalid-parameter" |

elements.name: Story is not deleted when the story id is not a parameter

steps.name: the "DELETE" request to "/projects/<Project.id>/stories/" is sent
the response status code should be 404

name: API Workspace
description:
As an application developer,
I want to manage pivotal Workspaces through REST API,
So that my app can get answers and show them.

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/my/workspaces/<Workspace.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key | value          |
| id  | <Workspace.id> |

the following body parameters:
| key  | value              |
| name | AUTO_NEW_WORKSPACE |
the "POST" request to "/my/workspaces" is sent
the response status code should be 200

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value            |
| name | <Workspace.name> |
| id   | <Workspace.id>   |
the "DELETE" request to "/my/workspaces/<Workspace.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 204

elements.name: Error when get a non-existent Workspace

steps.name: the "GET" request to "/my/workspaces/<Workspace.id>" is sent
the response status code should be 404

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value            |
| code | <Workspace.code> |
| kind | <Workspace.kind> |

elements.name: Error when workspace name is higher than 25

steps.name:
the following body parameters:
| key  | value                                           |
| name | AUTO_NEW_WORKSPACE_WITH_MORE_THAN_25_CHARACTERS |
the "POST" request to "/my/workspaces" is sent
the response status code should be 400

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value            |
| code | <Workspace.code> |
| kind | <Workspace.kind> |

elements.name: Error when workspace name is a integer

steps.name:
the following body parameters:
| key  | value |
| name | 12345 |
the "POST" request to "/my/workspaces" is sent
the response status code should be 400

the response body should be verified with:
| key  | value            |
| code | <Workspace.code> |
| kind | <Workspace.kind> |
